mapper.update: update b_outstoreloss set billid=billid ,billcode=#{billcode} ,billdate=#{billdate} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,grainattrid=#{grainattrid} ,producingyear=#{producingyear} ,instordate=#{instordate} ,outstordate=#{outstordate} ,keepmonth=#{keepmonth} ,isqty=#{isqty} ,iswaterrate=#{iswaterrate} ,oswaterrate=#{oswaterrate} ,waterlossqty=#{waterlossqty} ,isimpurate=#{isimpurate} ,osimpurate=#{osimpurate} ,impulossqty=#{impulossqty} ,osqty=#{osqty} ,keeplossqty=#{keeplossqty} ,keeplossrate=#{keeplossrate} ,rationlossrate=#{rationlossrate} ,rationlossqty=#{rationlossqty} ,orlossqty=#{orlossqty} ,profitqty=#{profitqty} ,passstate=#{passstate} ,preupdate=#{preupdate} ,`update`=#{update} ,outplanid=#{outplanid} ,repuserid=#{repuserid} ,lockflag=#{lockflag} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} ,updateuserid=#{updateuserid} ,remark=#{remark} where billid=#{billid}

update b_outstoreloss set billid=billid ,billcode=#{billcode} ,billdate=#{billdate} ,billstate=#{billstate} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,grainattrid=#{grainattrid} ,producingyear=#{producingyear} ,instordate=#{instordate} ,outstordate=#{outstordate} ,keepmonth=#{keepmonth} ,isqty=#{isqty} ,iswaterrate=#{iswaterrate} ,oswaterrate=#{oswaterrate} ,waterlossqty=#{waterlossqty} ,isimpurate=#{isimpurate} ,osimpurate=#{osimpurate} ,impulossqty=#{impulossqty} ,osqty=#{osqty} ,keeplossqty=#{keeplossqty} ,keeplossrate=#{keeplossrate} ,rationlossrate=#{rationlossrate} ,rationlossqty=#{rationlossqty} ,orlossqty=#{orlossqty} ,profitqty=#{profitqty} ,passstate=#{passstate} ,preupdate=#{preupdate} ,`update`=#{update} ,outplanid=#{outplanid} ,repuserid=#{repuserid} ,lockflag=#{lockflag} ,delflag=#{delflag} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} ,updateuserid=#{updateuserid} ,spuserid=#{spuserid} ,sptime=#{sptime} ,remark=#{remark} where 1=1 and billid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and billid =#{Where_Id} and billid=#{Where_billid} and billcode=#{Where_billcode} and billdate=#{Where_billdate} and billstate=#{Where_billstate} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and grainattrid=#{Where_grainattrid} and producingyear=#{Where_producingyear} and instordate=#{Where_instordate} and outstordate=#{Where_outstordate} and keepmonth=#{Where_keepmonth} and isqty=#{Where_isqty} and iswaterrate=#{Where_iswaterrate} and oswaterrate=#{Where_oswaterrate} and waterlossqty=#{Where_waterlossqty} and isimpurate=#{Where_isimpurate} and osimpurate=#{Where_osimpurate} and impulossqty=#{Where_impulossqty} and osqty=#{Where_osqty} and keeplossqty=#{Where_keeplossqty} and keeplossrate=#{Where_keeplossrate} and rationlossrate=#{Where_rationlossrate} and rationlossqty=#{Where_rationlossqty} and orlossqty=#{Where_orlossqty} and profitqty=#{Where_profitqty} and passstate=#{Where_passstate} and preupdate=#{Where_preupdate} and `update`=#{Where_update} and outplanid=#{Where_outplanid} and repuserid=#{Where_repuserid} and lockflag=#{Where_lockflag} and delflag=#{Where_delflag} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime} and updateuserid=#{Where_updateuserid} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and remark=#{Where_remark}
mapper.select: select t.billid "billid", t.billcode "billcode", t.billdate "billdate", t.billstate "billstate", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingyear "producingyear", t.instordate "instordate", t.outstordate "outstordate", t.keepmonth "keepmonth", t.isqty "isqty", t.iswaterrate "iswaterrate", t.oswaterrate "oswaterrate", t.waterlossqty "waterlossqty", t.isimpurate "isimpurate", t.osimpurate "osimpurate", t.impulossqty "impulossqty", t.osqty "osqty", t.keeplossqty "keeplossqty", t.keeplossrate "keeplossrate", t.rationlossrate "rationlossrate", t.rationlossqty "rationlossqty", t.orlossqty "orlossqty", t.profitqty "profitqty", t.passstate "passstate", t.preupdate "preupdate", t.update "update", t.outplanid "outplanid", t.repuserid "repuserid", t.lockflag "lockflag", t.delflag "delflag", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.remark "remark", lc.companyname "companyname", lgp.groupname "groupname", lgd.graindepotname "graindepotname", ls.storagename "storagename", lgr.grainattrname "grainattrname", lg.grainname "grainname" from b_outstoreloss t left join l_company lc on lc.companyid=t.companyid left join l_group lgp on lgp.groupid=t.groupid left join l_graindepot lgd on lgd.graindepotid=t.graindepotid left join l_storage ls on ls.storageid=t.storageid left join l_grain lg on lg.grainid=t.grainid left join l_grainattr lgr on lgr.grainattrid=t.grainattrid where 1=1 where billid=#{billid}

select count(*) from b_outstoreloss t where 1=1 and t.billid=#{billid} and t.billid!=#{NoId} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.instordate=#{instordate} and t.outstordate=#{outstordate} and t.keepmonth=#{keepmonth} and t.isqty=#{isqty} and t.iswaterrate=#{iswaterrate} and t.oswaterrate=#{oswaterrate} and t.waterlossqty=#{waterlossqty} and t.isimpurate=#{isimpurate} and t.osimpurate=#{osimpurate} and t.impulossqty=#{impulossqty} and t.osqty=#{osqty} and t.keeplossqty=#{keeplossqty} and t.keeplossrate=#{keeplossrate} and t.rationlossrate=#{rationlossrate} and t.rationlossqty=#{rationlossqty} and t.orlossqty=#{orlossqty} and t.profitqty=#{profitqty} and t.passstate=#{passstate} and t.preupdate=#{preupdate} and t.update=#{update} and t.outplanid=#{outplanid} and t.repuserid=#{repuserid} and t.lockflag=#{lockflag} and t.delflag=#{delflag} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.remark=#{remark}
SELECT max(billcode) FROM b_outstoreloss where billcode like CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d"),"%") and graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
